document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: FW: SDNY investigation 
Date: Wed. 30 Sen 2020 20:14:04 +0000 
Attachments: (CMA)_-yol._1_-_12-04-09.pdf; 
Team, 
Attached are the transcripts of :repositions. I'd like to schedule a team call for Friday to discuss them. Does 10 
a.m. Friday work for everyone for a call to discuss? If you need more time to review them, let me know and we can push 
to Monday. 
Thanks, 
From: Weinstein, Marc A. 
Sent: Wednesday, September 30, 2020 1:52 PM 
To: 
Cc: Andrew Tomback 
Subject: RE: SDNY investigation 
The transcripts are attached. We trust that the US Attorney's Office will keep these confidential other than to the extent 
disclosure is required in any pending case. 
Regards, 
Marc 
Marc A. 
Weinstein I Partner 
Chair. White Collar Defense 
Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP

connected with Jack Scarola last week. I just sent him an email to confirm that we can provide you with the

Best regards, 
Marc

From: 
Sent: Tuesday, September 22, 20204:42 PM 
To: Weinstein, Marc A 
Cc: Andrew Tomback 
EFTA00020871

Subject: RE: SONY investigation 
CAUTION: This email was sent by someone outside of the Firm. 
Marc, 
Thanks for following up on this. If it's okay with you, I think it makes sense to connect you with the plaintiff's attorney, 
Jack Scarola, so that he can convey this to you directly. I have spoken with him and explained the context here, and he 
has told me that he would be happy to speak with you. He is also seeking a copy of the transcript, as he has informed me 
that he no longer has his case files for matters this old. Here is his contact information: 
Jack Scarola 
Thank you, 
From: Weinstein, Marc A. 
Sent: Tuesday, September 22, 2020 11:24 AM 
To 
Cc: Andrew Tomback 
Subject: RE: SDNY investigation 
We haven't found a governing protective order, but to be safe, would you be able to get a letter or email fro 
attorney stating that they are not aware of a  protective order/agreement governing the disclosure of the transcrip , an 
to the extent one existed, they are waiving any provisions in order to permit the Estate to provide the transcript to the US 
Attorney's Office, and that they will not claim, in any forum, that the Co-Executors, the Estate, or any representatives of 
either, breached any such order/agreement in that case by providing the transcript to the US Attorney's Office. 
Let us know if that works on your end. 
Best regards, 
Marc 
Marc A. Weinstein I Partner 
Chair. White Collar Defense

Marc A. Weinstein I Partner 
Chair. Mile Collar Defense 
Hughes Hubbard & Reed LIP

Marc,

ism 
who is represented by Jack Scarola. The deposition 
took place in 2009, and Jeffrey Epstein was represented by Mark Luttier and Bob Critton of Critton, Luttier, and Coleman
